concept.title: Interface Method Types: Submit and Retrieve

section.title: Overview
section.p: The High Level API has two basic methods:

li.p: Submit - this method is used to provision data, including requests to create, modify, and delete data.
Retrieve - this method is used to query data.

section.p: Each method description specifies the appropriate Method Type (Submit or Retrieve).
